com.atakmap.app.preferences

Class ToolsPreferenceFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Fragment
      • android.preference.PreferenceFragment
        • com.atakmap.android.preference.AtakPreferenceFragment
          • com.atakmap.app.preferences.ToolsPreferenceFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class ToolsPreferenceFragment
extends AtakPreferenceFragment
    Class used to describe a tools preferences dynamically by plugins. The resulting preference is made available under the Tools and Preferences sub menu. The preference implemementation cannot have Preferences nested inside a PreferenceCategory.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ToolsPreferenceFragment.ToolPreference
      Describes the Tool Preference that is to be dynamically registered.
